de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.job.monitor

Interface IMonitor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AMonitor, ConsoleMonitor, NullMonitor, ProgressMonitor, SyncMonitor

    public interface IMonitor
    Control object for IJobs. Can be used to check for cancel request, display job progress, and calling intermediate functions.
    Author:
    Sebastian Krieter
